title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 09 February 2017 - XWiki
content:

10:21 <gdelhumeau> jshint 2.5.6 is stupid  
10:21 <gdelhumeau> it tells me "90,0: Identifier 'check\_all' is not in camel case."  
10:21 <gdelhumeau> but this is a method from an external lib  
10:21 <gdelhumeau> I cannot change it  
10:23 <gdelhumeau> found a workaroundf  
10:35 <tmortagne> has joined #xwiki  
10:52 <acotiuga> has joined #xwiki  
10:59 <Slashman> has joined #xwiki  
11:10 <vmassol> Denis: bad luck for the BFD :)  
11:11 <Denis> yep, I was disappointed :(  
11:23 <vmassol> hmmm this ci error looks weird: http://ci.xwiki.org/job/xwiki-platform/3699/console  
11:24 <vmassol> Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: org.xwiki.context.ExecutionContext  
11:24 <vmassol> Caused by: org.apache.maven.plugin.PluginContainerException: A required class was missing while executing org.xwiki.platform:xwiki-platform-tool-packager-plugin:9.1-SNAPSHOT:package: org/xwiki/context/ExecutionContext  
11:24 <vmassol> note that it looks like the strange errors I regularly get when build some func test on my machine  
11:24 <vmassol> but I never got to understand the problem  
11:26 <msmeria> has joined #xwiki  
11:27 <msmeria> has quit  
11:27 <msmeria> has joined #xwiki  
11:35 <acotiuga> has quit  
12:38 <Pbas> has quit  
12:39 <msmeria> has quit  
12:42 <msmeria> has joined #xwiki  
12:55 <Pbas> has joined #xwiki  
14:42 <vmassol> so 17 flickers to fix: https://jira.xwiki.org/issues/?jql=labels%20%3D%20flickering :)  
14:42 <vmassol> ah no  
14:42 <vmassol> less  
14:43 <vmassol> 12  
14:43 <vmassol> https://jira.xwiki.org/issues/?jql=labels%20%3D%20flickering%20and%20resolution%20%3D%20Unresolved  
14:51 <msmeria> has quit  
14:54 <msmeria> has joined #xwiki  
15:09 <msmeria> has quit  
15:12 <msmeria> has joined #xwiki  
15:13 <vmassol> tmortagne: is it a mistake that http://dev.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/GoogleSummerOfCode/Androidcontact2017 was selected for gsoc 2017 instead of being proposed?  
15:14 <tmortagne> vmassol: probably a bug in the copy tool  
15:14 <vmassol> the copy probably doesn't reset the field  
15:14 <tmortagne> I copied the page from 2016 GSOC  
15:14 <tmortagne> checking others  
15:15 <tmortagne> actually others were already proposed  
15:16 <tmortagne> I guess Enygma` (unless it was written by someone else, don't remember) was not expecting the copy of a selected project :)  
15:18 <vmassol> yep  
15:23 <msmeria> has quit  
16:06 <tmortagne> has quit  
16:20 <Denis2> has joined #xwiki  
16:22 <Denis> has quit  
16:27 <gdelhumeau> mflorea: where tree-finder is defined?  
16:27 <gdelhumeau> requirejs complains about this and I don't know what to change  
16:27 <gdelhumeau> mflorea: I have done what is described here: http://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Extension/Tree+Widget#HRequireJSConfiguration  
16:28 <gdelhumeau> my error is: Error: Script error for "tree-finder", needed by: tree  
16:32 <mflorea> gdelhumeau: finder.js is on the same place as tree.js https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-platform/tree/master/xwiki-platform-core/xwiki-platform-tree/xwiki-platform-tree-webjar/src/main/webjar . You need to add it to the require config  
16:33 <mflorea> there's an example require config there too https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-platform/blob/master/xwiki-platform-core/xwiki-platform-tree/xwiki-platform-tree-webjar/src/main/webjar/require-config.js  
16:33 <mflorea> that can be used  
16:33 <gdelhumeau> ok thanks  
16:34 <mflorea> there's an example usage here https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-platform/blob/master/xwiki-platform-core/xwiki-platform-tree/xwiki-platform-tree-war/src/main/webapp/resources/uicomponents/widgets/tree.js#L21  
16:43 <tmortagne> has joined #xwiki  
18:07 <mflorea> has quit  
18:34 <KermitTheFragger> has quit  
18:42 <vmassol> tmortagne: fyi, we now have a webhook on contrib so that should be ok to automaitcally trigger CI job creations for new repos: https://github.com/organizations/xwiki-contrib/settings/hooks
